commit message:
Merge pull request #1327 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1317-blank-picture-in-editor

Use dimensions of ContentEditText when resizing the picture

fix #1320: onPostClicked can be called from a separate thread,
this thread can run after the activity onStop() and in this case,
commiting the fragment will crash the app.

Replacing a call to `commit()` by a call to `commitAllowingStateLoss()` in
this particular case, will avoid a crash but also lose the fragment state:
the selected comment or post won't be recreated.

Revert 'fix #1320: onPostClicked can be called from a separate thread,'

This reverts commit 19732b4aab3fe83d99805e75b70488dc836f824d.
re-init menudrawer when comming back from settings
